title: Auto-Termination Validation
test_description: Validate that the Databricks cluster has auto-termination configured with appropriate timeout settings

api_calls.name: get_cluster_info
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const autoTermMinutes = responseData?.autotermination_minutes || 0; const clusterName = responseData?.cluster_name || 'Unknown'; return { ...currentVariables, auto_termination_minutes: autoTermMinutes, cluster_name: clusterName }; }

parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const clusterStep = stepResults.get_cluster_info; const maxAutoTermination = variables.oq_101_4_max_auto_termination || 120; const minAutoTermination = variables.oq_101_4_min_auto_termination || 0; const expected_result = `Auto-termination: â‰¤${maxAutoTermination} min`; let actual_result = 'Auto-termination: Not found'; if (clusterStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Failed to get cluster information', code: 'CLUSTER_INFO_ERROR', test_id: 'OQ-101-4', title: 'Auto-Termination Validation', expected_result, actual_result }; } const autoTermMinutes = variables.auto_termination_minutes || 0; actual_result = `Auto-termination: ${autoTermMinutes} min`; if (autoTermMinutes === 0) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Auto-termination is disabled (set to 0 minutes)', code: 'AUTO_TERMINATION_DISABLED', test_id: 'OQ-101-4', title: 'Auto-Termination Validation', expected_result, actual_result }; } if (autoTermMinutes < minAutoTermination) { return { status: 'fail', message: `Auto-termination is set to ${autoTermMinutes} minutes, which is below the minimum requirement of ${minAutoTermination} minutes`, code: 'AUTO_TERMINATION_TOO_LOW', test_id: 'OQ-101-4', title: 'Auto-Termination Validation', expected_result, actual_result }; } if (autoTermMinutes > maxAutoTermination) { return { status: 'fail', message: `Auto-termination is set to ${autoTermMinutes} minutes, which exceeds the maximum requirement of ${maxAutoTermination} minutes`, code: 'AUTO_TERMINATION_TOO_HIGH', test_id: 'OQ-101-4', title: 'Auto-Termination Validation', expected_result, actual_result }; } return { status: 'pass', message: `Auto-termination is properly configured at ${autoTermMinutes} minutes (within ${minAutoTermination}-${maxAutoTermination} range)`, code: 'AUTO_TERMINATION_VALID', test_id: 'OQ-101-4', title: 'Auto-Termination Validation', expected_result, actual_result }; }
